other_tests.changes_over_time: He did well until 4 months later, when he had another flare of pain requiring hospitalization.

other_tests.findings: Stones were removed and the stent was taken out.
other_tests.changes_over_time: He has been stable since that time.

other_tests.findings: Dilation and irregularity of the pancreatic duct; short segment of ductal stricture in the mid-body of the pancreas.
